  • Method Details

    • readFile

      public void readFile(File jasonFile, Map<String,String> entityMap) throws IOException, org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      This function will be called to read the file from the filepath and store it in a given map
      Parameters:
      jasonFile - the filepath storing entity data to read
      entityMap - the map to store all read data from filepath, this should be mutated
      Throws:
      IOException
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException

    • parseObject

      protected void parseObject(org.json.simple.JSONObject entityObject, Map<String,String> entityMap)
      This function will be called to parse a specific JSONObject and insert into the map
      Parameters:
      entityObject - the current object to parse and put into map
      entityMap - the map to store each object parsed from filepath, this should be mutated

    • save

      protected void save(File jasonFile, Map<String,String> entityMap) throws IOException
      This function saves all information currently in the map and writes it onto the filepath
      Parameters:
      jasonFile - the filepath storing entity data to read
      entityMap - the map that stores all entity objects parsed from filepath
      Throws:
      IOException

    • addorUpdateEntity

      public void addorUpdateEntity(File jasonFile, Map<String,String> entityMap, String entityId, String entityInfo) throws IOException
      This function updates the map and saves all information onto the filepath
      Parameters:
      jasonFile - the filepath storing entity data to read
      entityMap - the map that stores all entity objects parsed from filepath
      entityId - the current entityId to be updated or added to the map
      entityInfo - the information in string form associated with the current entity to be updated or added
      Throws:
      IOException
